gameplayModel

Class GridMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameplayModel.GridMap

  • public class GridMap
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines the underlying map during game play. It contains all the methods used to initialize the maps for gameplay. It will generate all of the GridObject and place them on the map according to level specification
    Author:
    Chao Yue

    • Constructor Detail

      • GridMap

        public GridMap(int[] levelSpecification)
        Used for GridMap Initialization based on the specification of each level
        Parameters:
        levelSpecification - the number and the types of GridObjects in each level

      • GridMap

        public GridMap(int spawnTimer,
       java.util.ArrayList<Brick> bricks,
       java.util.ArrayList<Bomb> bombs,
       java.util.ArrayList<Enemy> enemies,
       Exitway exitway,
       PowerUp powerup,
       Bomberman bomberman)
        Used for GridMap Initialization based on a series of level specification
        Parameters:
        spawnTimer - sync with the gameplay timer
        bricks - the location and number of bricks on each level
        bombs - the location, number and types of bombs on each level
        enemies - the location, number and types of enemies on each level
        exitway - the location of exitway on each level
        powerup - the location, number and types of PowerUps on each level
        bomberman - the location of bomberman object

      • toCSVEntry

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> toCSVEntry()
        Prepare each GridObject for saving into CSV files
        Returns:
        an array list of different array lists of GridObject eg. enemy, powerup, etc... ready for CSV writing
